entry.content: YouTuber Sojang, infamous for her derogatory videos about K-pop stars, has been sentenced to a 10 million won ($7,460) fine on Wednesday for defamation of singer Kang Daniel. The fine was three times higher than the 3 million won fine that the prosecution recommended the judge.
